s: Honestly...this is my favorite and I have used all of them. Bonafide holds best for me. I have thick curly hair. I keep it short though and this pomade holds perfect. ... Bona Fide products are great however for a more natural finish I would recommend their Matte Paste.

s: Scent is nice, not super strong. Bona Fide makes the best pomade and this particular one is the only one that works on my very thick and hard to manage hair. You can style it using combs, brush or your hands and this will give you the exact right amount of hold you need.
